mapper.select: select ipayment from t_product_payment where iproduct = #{iproduct} and ipayment = #{ipayment}
select iproduct from t_product_payment where iproduct = #{iproduct} and ipayment = #{ipayment}

select P.deposit, P.price, PA.rental_start_date as rentalStartDate, PA.rental_end_date as rentalEndDate from t_product P left join t_product_payment PP on P.iproduct = PP.iproduct left join t_payment PA on PP.ipayment = PA.ipayment where P.iproduct = #{iproduct}
mapper.insert: insert into t_payment (ibuyer, ipayment_method, rental_start_date, rental_end_date, rental_duration, price, code) values (#{ibuyer}, #{ipaymentMethod}, #{rentalStartDate}, #{rentalEndDate}, #{rentalDuration}, #{price}, #{code})
mapper.select: select PA.istatus, PA.rental_end_date as rentalEndDate, P.iuser as iSeller, PA.ibuyer as iBuyer from t_product_payment PPA join t_product P on P.iproduct = PPA.iproduct join t_payment PA on PA.ipayment = PPA.ipayment where PA.ipayment = #{ipayment} and PA.istatus != -1
mapper.update: update t_payment set istatus = #{istatus} where ipayment = #{ipayment}
